verses.verse: וַיַּ֖עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אִיּ֥וֹב <S%H347><s%> Then Job אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> and said

[יָדַעְתָּ כ] (יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge ק) כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> do כֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all תּוּכָ֑ל <S%H3201><s%> that thou canst do וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִבָּצֵ֖ר <S%H1219><s%> can be withholden מִמְּךָ֣ <S%H4480><s%> at מְזִמָּֽה׃ <S%H4209><s%> every [thing] and [that] no thought

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who זֶ֨ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> is this מַעְלִ֥ים <S%H5956><s%> Who [is] he that hideth עֵצָ֗ה <S%H6098><s%> counsel בְּֽלִ֫י <S%H1097><s%> without דָ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> cunning לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הִ֭גַּדְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> have declared וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not אָבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> that I understood נִפְלָא֥וֹת <S%H6381><s%> not things too wonderful מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> too וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not אֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> for me which I knew

שְֽׁמַֽע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear נָ֭א <S%H4994><s%> now וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> and I אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> I beseech thee and I will speak אֶ֝שְׁאָלְךָ֗ <S%H7592><s%> I will demand וְהוֹדִיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3045><s%> of thee and declare

לְשֵֽׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> I have heard אֹ֥זֶן <S%H241><s%> of the ear שְׁמַעְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H8088><s%> of thee by the hearing וְ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now עֵינִ֥י <S%H5869><s%> but now mine eye רָאָֽתְךָ׃ <S%H7200><s%> seeth

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֭ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אֶמְאַ֣ס <S%H3988><s%> Wherefore I abhor וְנִחַ֑מְתִּי <S%H5162><s%> [myself] and repent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> in dust וָאֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H665><s%> and ashes פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַחַ֨ר <S%H310><s%> And it was [so] that after דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> had spoken יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִיּ֑וֹב <S%H347><s%> unto Job וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִיפַ֣ז <S%H464><s%> to Eliphaz הַתֵּֽימָנִ֗י <S%H8489><s%> the Temanite חָרָ֨ה <S%H2734><s%> is kindled אַפִּ֤י <S%H639><s%> My wrath בְךָ֙ וּבִשְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> against thee and against thy two רֵעֶ֔יךָ <S%H7453><s%> friends כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not דִבַּרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H1696><s%> for ye have not spoken אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> is נְכוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3559><s%> of me [the thing that is] right כְּעַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> as my servant אִיּֽוֹב׃ <S%H347><s%> Job

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now קְחֽוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> Therefore take לָכֶ֣ם שִׁבְעָֽה־ <S%H7651><s%> unto you now seven פָרִים֩ <S%H6499><s%> bullocks וְשִׁבְעָ֨ה <S%H7651><s%> and seven אֵילִ֜ים <S%H352><s%> rams וּלְכ֣וּ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> and go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדִּ֣י <S%H5650><s%> to my servant אִיּ֗וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job וְהַעֲלִיתֶ֤ם <S%H5927><s%> and offer up עוֹלָה֙ <S%H5930><s%> for yourselves a burnt offering בַּֽעַדְכֶ֔ם <S%H1157><s%> about וְאִיּ֣וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> and my servant יִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <S%H6419><s%> shall pray עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> because אִם־ <S%H518><s%> for פָּנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> for you for him אֶשָּׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> will I accept לְבִלְתִּ֞י <S%H1115><s%> so עֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> lest I deal עִמָּכֶם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with נְבָלָ֔ה <S%H5039><s%> with you [after your] folly כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not דִבַּרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H1696><s%> in that ye have not spoken אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> is נְכוֹנָ֖ה <S%H3559><s%> of me [the thing which is] right כְּעַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> like my servant אִיּֽוֹב׃ <S%H347><s%> Job

וַיֵּלְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> went אֱלִיפַ֨ז <S%H464><s%> So Eliphaz הַתֵּֽימָנִ֜י <S%H8489><s%> the Temanite וּבִלְדַּ֣ד <S%H1085><s%> and Bildad הַשּׁוּחִ֗י <S%H7747><s%> the Shuhite צֹפַר֙ <S%H6691><s%> [and] Zophar הַנַּ֣עֲמָתִ֔י <S%H5284><s%> the Naamathite וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> commanded אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> as יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> according as the LORD וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> also accepted יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> them the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> accept אִיּֽוֹב׃ <S%H347><s%> Job

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD שָׁ֚ב <S%H7725><s%> turned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> captive ק) אִיּ֔וֹב <S%H347><s%> of Job בְּהִֽתְפַּֽלְל֖וֹ <S%H6419><s%> when he prayed בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> for רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> for his friends וַ֧יֹּסֶף <S%H3254><s%> gave יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> also the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לְאִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> Job לְמִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <S%H4932><s%> twice as much

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then came אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> then כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶחָ֨יו <S%H251><s%> there unto him all his brethren וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all [אַחְיֹתָיו כ] (אַחְיֹותָ֜יו <S%H269><s%> other ק) וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹדְעָ֣יו <S%H3045><s%> and all they that had been of his acquaintance לְפָנִ֗ים <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֹּאכְל֨וּ <S%H398><s%> and did eat עִמּ֣וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לֶחֶם֮ <S%H3899><s%> bread בְּבֵיתוֹ֒ <S%H1004><s%> with him in his house וַיָּנֻ֤דוּ <S%H5110><s%> and they bemoaned לוֹ֙ וַיְנַחֲמ֣וּ <S%H5162><s%> him and comforted אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> him over all the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> had brought יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> also gave ל֗וֹ אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> upon him every man קְשִׂיטָ֣ה <S%H7192><s%> piece of money אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> him a וְאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one נֶ֥זֶם <S%H5141><s%> an earring זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one ס

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> So the LORD בֵּרַ֛ךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> the latter end אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> of Job מֵרֵאשִׁת֑וֹ <S%H7225><s%> more than his beginning וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֡וֹ אַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> teen אֶ֜לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand צֹ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> and six אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand גְּמַלִּ֔ים <S%H1581><s%> camels וְאֶֽלֶף־ <S%H505><s%> and a thousand צֶ֥מֶד <S%H6776><s%> yoke בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> of oxen וְאֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> and a thousand אֲתוֹנֽוֹת׃ <S%H860><s%> she asses
וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֛וֹ שִׁבְעָ֥נָה <S%H7658><s%> He had also seven בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וְשָׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three בָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> daughters

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> And he called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> of the first יְמִימָ֔ה <S%H3224><s%> Jemima וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> of the second קְצִיעָ֑ה <S%H7103><s%> Kezia וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֖ית <S%H7992><s%> of the third קֶ֥רֶן הַפּֽוּךְ׃ <S%H7163><s%> Kerenhappuch

וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> no נִמְצָ֜א <S%H4672><s%> found נָשִׁ֥ים <S%H802><s%> were no women יָפ֛וֹת <S%H3303><s%> [so] fair כִּבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> as the daughters אִיּ֖וֹב <S%H347><s%> of Job בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And in all the land וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֧ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֲבִיהֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> and their father נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> them inheritance בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> their brethren ס

וַיְחִ֤י <S%H2421><s%> this lived אִיּוֹב֙ <S%H347><s%> Job אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> After זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> and forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years [וַיַּרְא כ] (וַיִּרְאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> advise self ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> his sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' בָנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> sons אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> [even] four דֹּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations
וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died אִיּ֔וֹב <S%H347><s%> So Job זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2205><s%> [being] old וּשְׂבַ֥ע <S%H7649><s%> and full יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> of days
